sentences.en: A preemptive strike against a sovereign nation raises moral and legal issues.
sentences.cn: 对一个主权国家进行先发制人的攻击会引起道德和法律上的争议。

sentences.en: And that the country's nuclear weapons will not be used for a preemptive attack.
sentences.cn: 并且朝鲜的核武器不会用作袭击他国.

sentences.en: China, therefore, made use of a well - established principle in international law, and acted in preemptive self - defence .
sentences.cn: 根据既定的国际法原则, 中国于是采取了先发制人的 自卫.

sentences.en: First, this paper studies multiple servers queues with impatient customers of preemptive priority.

sentences.en: How can steel take advantage of the capital market and the preemptive opportunities?

sentences.en: I say this jump was preemptive.
sentences.cn: 我说这样跳叫是先发制人的.

sentences.en: I've recommended a preemptive Exocet Missile attack against his airforce.
sentences.cn: 我曾经提议过发起先发制人的飞鱼飞弹攻击他的空军.

sentences.en: In addition, to avoid preemptive shares, funds on shares issued after the fight.

sentences.cn: 无优先的调度策略更容易实现一些但适合在嵌入式系统中使用.

sentences.en: Objective To evaluate the clinical effects of butorphanol preemptive analgesia on brachial plexus block with ropivacaine.
sentences.cn: 目的评价布托啡诺超前镇痛对罗哌卡因臂丛阻滞效果的影响.

sentences.en: Preemptive Self - defense aroused a bitter controversy over international law of self - defense and the United Nations.
sentences.cn: “ 先发制人 ”对国际法、合国造成了巨大的冲击.

sentences.en: Recent findings: algancicloir has proved effective in cytomegalovirus prevention for prophylactic and preemptive therapy.
sentences.cn: 近期发现: 先期预防性应用缬更昔洛韦在对巨细胞病毒的预防是有效的.

sentences.en: S . preemptive war angered many people around the world.
sentences.cn: 这场先发制人的战争也引起了世界人民的愤怒.

sentences.cn: 先发制人地叫牌;桥牌用语.

sentences.en: To that end, preemptive intelligence, often acquired by unconventional means, is feedstock of sensible anticipatory action.
sentences.cn: 为此, 通常用非常规手段来获取情报, 而先发制人的情报是明智行动的基础.

trans.tran_cn: 先买的，有先买权的，先发制人的
trans.tran_en: A preemptive attack or strike is intended to weaken or damage an enemy or opponent, for example, by destroying their weapons before they can do any harm
